sub_title: IT Infrastructure specialist Azure Cloud and On-Prem | MSc in Computer Networks and Information Security | Cloud Solutions Architect Expert | MS Certified Azure Security Engineer (Azure ☁️) | ISC Candidate
summary: Experienced in Information Technology Solutions with a demonstrated history of working with various businesses like Retail, pharmaceuticals and IT industry. Skilled in Solutions on both Azure cloud and on premises infrastructure and security , Technical project management and guiding the teams with knowledge and team work. Strong engineering professional with the MBCS,BCS-PGD and MSc in Network and Information Security focused in IT security and Computer networks from Kingston University.
